sentences.en: ...the International Monetary Fund and its sister organization, the World Bank.
sentences.cn: …国际货币基金组织和它的姐妹机构，世界银行。

sentences.en: Anita envied her sister's amorality and contempt for public opinion.
sentences.cn: 安妮塔羡慕姐姐不受道德观念的制约，藐视公众舆论。

sentences.en: As a child she fought with her younger sister.
sentences.cn: 她小时候会和妹妹打架。

sentences.en: As a little girl, Karan was closest to her sister Gail.
sentences.cn: 卡兰小的时候和姐姐盖尔最亲。

sentences.en: Ask to speak to the sister on the ward.
sentences.cn: 请求和病房里的护士长说话。

sentences.en: Good morning, Sister Mary.
sentences.cn: 早上好，玛丽修女。

sentences.en: He has two sisters and a brother.
sentences.cn: 他有两个姊妹和一个弟弟。

sentences.en: Janet and Abby are sisters.
sentences.cn: 珍妮特和阿比是两姐妹。

sentences.en: John gently disengaged himself from his sister's tearful embrace.
sentences.cn: 约翰轻轻推开抱着他哭泣的妹妹。

sentences.en: My sister is the same height but only a size 12.
sentences.cn: 我姐姐是一样的身高，不过只穿12号的。

sentences.en: Now that she was retired she lived with her sister.
sentences.cn: 现在她已经退休了，和姐姐一起住。

sentences.en: Ray and sister Renee lived just 25 miles apart from each other.
sentences.cn: 雷和妹妹勒妮的住处仅相隔25英里。

sentences.en: She led a normal, happy life with her sister and brother.
sentences.cn: 她和弟弟妹妹一起过着平凡而幸福的生活。

sentences.en: She made liberal use of her elder sister's make-up and clothes.
sentences.cn: 她随便把姐姐的化妆品和衣服拿来用。

sentences.en: She’s my twin sister .
sentences.cn: 她是我的孪生妹妹。

sentences.en: Sister Francesca entered the chapel, took her seat, and promptly fell asleep.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝卡修女走进小教堂，坐下来，很快就睡着了。

sentences.en: Sister Morrison might take issue with me on that matter.
sentences.cn: 莫里森修女在那件事上或许会和我持不同意见。

sentences.en: The parting from his sister had a positive effect on John.
sentences.cn: 和姐姐分开对约翰来说有好处。

sentences.en: the ward sister
sentences.cn: 病房护士长

sentences.en: Well we did have a midnight feast, me and my sister.
sentences.cn: 我和姐姐的确在半夜大吃了一顿。

sentences.en: You write very movingly of your sister Amy's suicide.
sentences.cn: 你对你妹妹埃米的自杀描写很是让人伤感。

words.tran_cn: 姐妹之谊；姐妹关系；妇女团体（等于sisterhood）
夫人,太太,小家伙,小娃娃

phrases.tran_cn: 同父异母或同母异父姐妹
嫂子；姑子；姨子；弟媳；妯娌
姐妹船，姊妹船；同型船；姊妹舰

trans.tran_en: You can use sister to describe something that is of the same type or is connected in some way to another thing you have mentioned. For example, if a company has a sister company, they are connected.

trans.tran_cn: 姐妹，（称志同道合者）姐妹，修女，护士
trans.tran_en: a girl or woman who has the same parents as you
a girl or woman who has the same parents as you
